column5: it appears that your clock is off by 4 hours from eastern time. i realize that most of the posters here are on central time. they are off by 3 hours. let's get this fixed. it's very annoying.
[font color=green size=3][b]8:59 pm cdst, I can live with 5 minutes of error. It dosen't annoy me.

Vitreum... Each person's computer shows a different time on these posts, depending on what time zone you are set for in the personal preferences. Go change the time zone and the posts will all read the correct time. Note that there is no selection for Daylight Savings Time, so you have to pick one time zone west.
It doesn't annoy me either. I noticed something unusual several days ago. Where I am showed the date as the next day...but I thought 'what the hey'. Throw away your watch, FOGEDABOUDIT!
ok, bigfish. i set the time. thanks.
